full_name: Scenario II: Return to The Last King

steps.text: Remove Agenda 1a - "Fashionably Late" from the game and replace it with the new Agenda 1a - "Better Never Than Late."
Set the Shocking Display treachery and the new Dianne Devine (Hiding an Oath Unspoken) ally aside, out of play. Remove the original Dianne Devine (Mercurial and Mischevious) from the game.
Place the 8 “Sickening Reality” story cards underneath the scenario reference card.

bullets.text: Note: These cards are double-sided and have encounter cards on their other side. For the best experience, do not look at the other side unless an effect instructs you to do so.
